properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I saw a door open wide in heaven I heard a voice calling Come and see Behold a throne of radiant light Heaven’s worship rises to the Lord Most High{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Holy Holy is the Lord God Almighty Glory honor power to the Lord our God Holy Holy Holy is the Lord God Almighty We will worship Him Who lives forever{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I heard a voice crying Who is worthy To take the book and to break its seals None was found in heaven or earth All have sinned, no one was worthy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But Who is this standing at the throne Who overcame to open up the scroll He’s the Lion of Judah He has overcome{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold the Lamb He alone is worthy The Son of Man now enthroned in glory He has the keys of death and of hell He is alive and He will reign forevermore{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Holy Holy is the Lord God Almighty Glory Honor Power to the Risen Lamb Holy Holy Holy is the Lord God Almighty We will worship Him Who lives forever (2x) We will worship Him Who lives forever We will worship Him Who lives forever{/lang-eng}
